definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to be concerned about/to care about
to show concern and care for

sentences.english: The CrossCorrelation is an essential means of getting disturbing industrial frequency.
sentences.chinese: 互相关函数是确定工频干扰噪声频率的一个重要手段。

sentences.english: It said people should cover their mouths when outside and keep doors and windows closed.
sentences.chinese: 还说人们外出时应该遮好嘴巴并且关好门窗。

sentences.english: We keep animals in pens to fatten them.
sentences.chinese: 我们把动物关在围栏里把它们养肥。

sentences.english: “We close the front door, and they go through the back door,” he says.
sentences.chinese: Tith说，“我们把前门关了，他们还会走后门。”

sentences.english: King Nedega was very upset and ordered that she be locked up.
sentences.chinese: 内德加国王非常不高兴，便下令把她关起来。

sentences.english: Turn down the radio please, it's too noisy.
sentences.chinese: 把收音机音量关小点，太吵啦。

sentences.english: Maybe. Anyway, what's it to you?
sentences.chinese: 或许吧。不过，关你什么事？

sentences.english: I kindly told him to turn it down a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 我友善地告诉他，把音响的音量关小点。

sentences.english: His wise leadership brought the people through the war.
sentences.chinese: 他的英明领导使人民安全渡过战争关。

sentences.english: The police caught the guy but set him free after six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 警察抓住了那家伙，但是关了六个星期就把他放了。

sentences.english: All products have to go through three checks in the whole process.
sentences.chinese: 所有产品在整个生产过程中得通过三道质量检查关。

sentences.english: We must check on guarantee of design and construction in road surface of cement concrete.
sentences.chinese: 对此应严把水泥混凝土路面的设计关和施工关。

sentences.english: If God were to close the door on you, He would leave a window open.
sentences.chinese: 上帝为你关了这扇门必会为你再开一口窗。

sentences.english: Could you turn down the car radio?
sentences.chinese: 你可以把车里的收音机音量关小点吗？

sentences.english: All products have to go through five checks in the whole process.
sentences.chinese: 所有产品在整个生产过程中得五道质量检查关。

sentences.english: Guan Major led the troops to raid the church.

definition: to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
